description: Try our easy to follow Pear, Grapefruit & Celery Juice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear, Grapefruit & Celery Juice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the grapefruit and divide it into segments. Separate the lettuce into leaves. Trim the celery and cut it into 5 cm lengths. Quarter the pear. Juice the grapefruit with the lettuce, celery and pear.
Pour the juice into a glass over ice, if using, and serve immediately.
